alert.note: Alert for Tooele (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 2:45PM MDT until June 06 at 3:30PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Tooele County in northern Utah... * Until 330 PM MDT * At 244 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northwest of Skull Valley, or 23 miles west of Grantsville, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Delle, Knolls, Clive, Skull Valley and Utah Test and Training Range North. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 40 and 70. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
